Name: Simon
description:
Simon, aged 70, is married and a father of 6. He is a resident of Rubanda District in Western Uganda. He is a farmer and also earns from milk sales and selling goats for profit.

Simon has a challenge with firewood for cooking and therefore is seeking for a loan with EBO SACCO to buy a biogas kit to solve this challenge. He believes it's a way of conserving the environment, which makes it a better place for everyone to live in.
